contentList.content: Within the range of a creature's <LSTag Tooltip=<GOON_MAGICALLERGY_AURA"<Magic Allergy</LSTag>.
The creature is reacting to nearby magic and has become unstable. At the start of its next turn, it will trigger a random effect.
Allergic to magic. If a spell or <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag> is cast close to the creature, it might react to the magic and trigger a random effect.

All incoming damage is reduced by [1].

An omnipotent force provides this creature with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SANCTUARY">Sanctuary</LSTag> at the start of combat.

An omnipotent force provides this creature with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SANCTUARY">Sanctuary</LSTag> at the end of their turn. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SANCTUARY">Sanctuary</LSTag> can reapply this way at the end of every second turn.
The Spider Queen Matriarch certainly got the gyatt.
A shared resource pool for defensive abilities.
An omnipotent force has gifted this creature with [1] charge(s) of a resource pool for defensive abilities.
This creature has used a defensive ability and must wait to do so again.

This creature devoures the magical energy of the weave from all around them.
A presence is draining the character of its magical energy, preventing it from casting spells.

The creature's targets are cursed by transgressed and irritable gods. When it falls unconscious, it immediately dies. Moreover, when it dies, a terrible envoy of the offended deity is conjured from the entity's corpse.
According to Lorroakan, these are nothing but "Meaningless cantrips and playthings." Yet you can tell someone has studied it closely, tried to copy the formula, and failed.
This creature cannot be forced to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="COMMAND_APPROACH">Approach</LSTag>.
This creature cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
This creature cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>.

This effect is cumulative, not multiplicative.
This effect can trigger once per Attack.
This effect is also active while Polymorphed, including Wild Shape.
This effect is also active while Wild Shaped.
This effect is only active in Wild Shape.
This effect is not active in Wild Shape.
